title: Fraudulent enlistment, appointment, or separation
context: [ยง124A-118] Fraudulent enlistment, appointment, or separation. Any person who: (1) Procures the person&rsquo;s own enlistment or appointment in the state military forces by knowingly false representation or deliberate concealment as to the person&rsquo;s qualifications for that enlistment or appointment and receives pay or allowances thereunder; or (2) Procures the person&rsquo;s own separation from the state military forces by knowingly false representation or deliberate concealment as to the person&rsquo;s eligibility for that separation; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
